title: WILL LEAGUE OF LEGENDS RUN SMOOTHLY ON THIS PC???
body:
I may be buying a new computer on a tight budget and wondering if this will run league of legends in 1080p at 35-60 fps ??
Intel Pentium G3258 3.2GHz Dual-Core Processor
MSI H81M-P33 Micro ATX LGA1150 Motherboard
G.Skill Value 8GB (1 x 8GB) DDR3-1600 Memory
Seagate Barracuda 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive
Gigabyte GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB WINDFORCE Video Card
Silverstone PS08B (Black) MicroATX Mid Tower Case
Antec 500W ATX Power Supply

replies.body:
Hey there,

You definitely shouldn't have an issue playing league on that PC.
